page.title: 07Industry on Hunshelf.
page.content: The only large industrial concern is the B.S.C. Wire Department,part of their Stocksbridge works. The department is owned by the British Steel Corporation,but it is a limited liability company. Fortunately,it is,at the moment, very profitable.It was built in 1963 when the department consisted of 33 bays.Ten years later ,an extension resulted in ten more functional bays being opened.There are now 197 men and 23 women employed there. There are two sections to the department:the first is for carbon and alloy steels,the second for stainless steels.End products include welding rods,wire and springs.
